help.title: Help and FAQ
help.head: Using the WorldSirenMap is simple, intuitive and self-explanatory. Answers to frequently asked questions can be found below. If you have any further questions, please contact us directly by e-mail:

entry01.title: How do I insert sites?
entry01.content: First you need an account. After logging in, you can either click on the large plus button at the bottom right of the map to add a site and enter the coordinates freely, or right-click on the map at the desired location and add a site there.

entry02.title: How can I edit sites?
entry02.content: First you need an account. After logging in, simply click on the site icon on the map that you want to edit. The site details will open. In the bottom right-hand corner of the details window, you can activate the change mode for this site.

entry03.title: Can there be several sirens at one site?
entry03.content: Yes, this is possible and desired. Sirens within a radius of 20m are combined into one site. There can also be several entries for former and active sirens at one site.

contribute.head: WorldSirenMap is a community project and depends on everyone in the community doing their bit. In addition to maintaining sites and the library, you also have the opportunity to participate in the development of the web application. We look forward to your contribution!

translation.title: Translations
translation.content: The web application is designed to be multilingual. We are happy to accept new language files and integrate them into the application.

icons.title: Siren icons
icons.content: A separate project has been set up, which provides freely available and high-resolution SVG icons. If icons for siren types are missing there, you are welcome to contribute them.

frontend.title: Web application
frontend.content: The web application was developed using the React framework and is constantly being improved. Everyone is invited to participate in the development and improvement.

bugfeatures.title: Bugs and feature requests
bugfeatures.content: We are happy to receive tips on bugs and ideas for new features by e-mail. Just send them to:

listdetailspanel.select: Select an item from the list

edit.type-error: You must select a siren type
edit.condition-error: You must select a siren condition!
edit.tags-error: Tags must contain only letters and numbers!

delete.confirm: Are you sure to delete this siren?
